title: (VIDEO) Cardinal leads silent protest in Colombo
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Archbishop of Colombo His Eminence Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith led a silent protest in Colombo with Rev. Fathers and Rev. Sisters, on Tuesday (5).
The silent protest commenced from Bishop House, and proceeded towards the Borella Junction and returned to the Bishop House in Borella.
‘The people are calling for the President and the Parliament to resign. The people also want back the money that was stolen,” said Rev. Fr. Cyril Gamini.
IMF monitoring political & economic developments in SL very closely – Report
